steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(2), number_in_box(6), put_result_into_box(2)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 1), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(4), 2), number_in_box(4)), then_go_to_step(4), then_go_to_step(4)),
Put(number_in_box(1), into_box(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(8), 1), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(1), then_go_to_step(6)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 1), number_in_box(2)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(1)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 2), increase(1)),
Put(number_in_box(4), into_box(7)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(8), 1), increase(1)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 2?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在2号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Multiply: ( number in box 2 ) * ( number in box 6 ), put result into box 2.
Change Instruction 1: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 4 greater than ( number in box 4 )
Put ( number in box 1 ) into box 1
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 8 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 2 )
Change Instruction 1: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Put ( number in box 4 ) into box 7
Change Instruction 8: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
desc_zh: 相乘：2号盒子中的数字*6号盒子中的数字，将结果放在2号盒子中。
更改指令1：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令4中第2个盒子的编号比4号盒子中的数字大吗
将1号盒子中的数字放在1号盒子中
判断：指令8中第1个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
判断：指令1中第1个盒子的编号比2号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令1：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
将4号盒子中的数字放在7号盒子中
更改指令8：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
